summary:
This mod will add a new weapon to the forge: Eruanna, Blade of the rider.
Requested by GavstormNL.
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HqjGK.png[/IMG]

[size=\"3\"][color=\"#4169E1\"]Description[/color][/size]
===========
This mod will add a new weapon to the forge inspired by the Inheritance Cycle: Eruanna, Blade of the rider.
It is craftable in both 1-handed and 2-handed. Crafting the weapon does not require any perk. however, it does require some hard to get materials.

[size=\"3\"][color=\"#4169E1\"]Known Issues or Bugs[/color][/size]
====================
None so far.

[size=\"3\"][color=\"#4169E1\"]History[/color][/size]
=======
v1 - Initial release
v1.1 - tuned mesh: tweaked the glossiness
v1.2 - revised textures! 
v1.3 - Weapons are now temperable at the grindstone.

[size=\"3\"][color=\"#4169E1\"]Contact[/color][/size]
=======
Right here on the Nexus.

[size=\"3\"][color=\"#4169E1\"]Credits[/color][/size]
=======
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim and the CK.
Thanks to The Nexus.com for the great service they provide.
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on.
Thanks to RelativelyBest for his \"Rider blade\" design.
Thanks to GavstormNL for requesting this weapon.

[size=\"3\"][color=\"#4169E1\"]Tools Used[/color][/size]
==========
7-Zip - http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=15579
Blender - http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=12248
GIMP - http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=14920
NIFSkope - http://niftools.sourceforge.net/wiki/NifSkope
Readme Generator - http://HammondsLegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp

[size=\"3\"][color=\"#4169E1\"]Licensing/Legal[/color][/size]
===============
The contents of this mod can only be used after obtaining permission from me.
If you like to weapon, get it from my resource: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12087

Related
===============
Looking for a fancy weapon to include in your new mod?
Look no further! Check out my
[img]http://i.imgur.com/w43aI.png[/img]
No permission needed, models and textures included in every download!
author: Urwy
